overview: Collection of five short films from Brentwood and Falcon Studios. "Bruno & Shane" (a.k.a. "Pick-Up Truck") — Taut-bodied young drifter Shane takes Bruno's thick meat standing up, lying down, on a ladder and across the tailgate of a pickup. "Everything Works!" — Hawk invited his buddy Bruce to go along for a jeep ride in the hills. Though neither had ever admitted wanting each other, Bruce had a hidden desire to explore Hawk sexually from head to toe. "Hayride" — Man-boy Bob Bishop turns on his ranch boss Barry, and before you know it Bob is pulling down his overalls, exposing those slick muscles and his perfect pair of buns. "The Lifeguard" — Superstar Gordon Grant is daydreaming over a girlie mag when he's surprised by two beach buddies who walk into Grant's seashore lifeguard station and catch the sex giant working up his supercharged fuckstick. "Handyman" — Solo film featuring Wally.
title: Hayride
